translations: v.侵蚀；（使）疲倦；磨损（abrade 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 研磨, 研磨修整, 腐蚀
磨耗试验器, 磨耗试验机
研磨剂, 磨料, 翻译
研磨工具, 磨光机, 详细翻译

sentences.sentence: It ACTS as a geologic rasp, scratching, gouging and generally abrading the surfaces over which the glacier rides.
sentences.translation: 它就像一把地质锉刀一样通过刮、刨等作用来磨损冰川流过的表面。

sentences.sentence: This article narrated the structure and aPPlication result of the new type machine which abrading twenty square Porcelain.
sentences.translation: 本文主要叙述了新型二十头瓷质磨砖边方形机组的结构和应用效果。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the clinical efficacy of high-speed electric burr abrading procedure for inferior turbinate bone hypertrophy.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨高速电钻下鼻甲骨磨削术治疗下鼻甲肥大的临床效果。
